author: lightclient
content:
nice overview of the start up process!

> I donâ€™t know how far can a CL client go only with those endpoints.
It wont actually go very far unfortunately - i would curious to understand exactly what happens in lighthouse after the initial fcu, but eventually it is going to start sending `newPayloadV2` to the EL. This is how the CL uses the EL to ensure the validity of the execution payload. If you're trying to implement this on a portal client, you will need i) and EVM and ii) to implement state look ups for execution.

This might be difficult given the latency of pushing state into portal. I dont on the top of mind remember what the timeout for newpayload is.
